Package org.lgdcloudsim.record

Interface SqlRecord

All Known Implementing Classes:
SqlRecordNull, SqlRecordSimple
public interface SqlRecord
SqlRecord is an interface for the record of the simulation through the SQLite database. It records the information of the user requests, the instance groups, the instance group graph, the instances and the conflicts.
Since:
LGDCloudSim 1.0
Author:
Anonymous

  • Method Details

    • getDbPath

      String getDbPath()
      Get the path of the SQLite database.
      Returns:
      the path of the SQLite database.

    • setDbPath

      void setDbPath(String dbPath)
      Set the path of the SQLite database.
      Parameters:
      dbPath - the path of the SQLite database.

    • recordUserRequestsSubmitInfo

      void recordUserRequestsSubmitInfo(List<UserRequest> userRequests)
      Record the user requests submit information. It records the id, the data center id where the user request belongs, the submit time and the number of the instance groups.
      Parameters:
      userRequests - the user requests.

    • recordUserRequestFinishInfo

      void recordUserRequestFinishInfo(UserRequest userRequest)
      Record the user request finish information. It records the finish time, the state and the fail reason of the user request.
      Parameters:
      userRequest - the user request.

    • recordInstanceGroupsReceivedInfo

      void recordInstanceGroupsReceivedInfo(List requests)
      Record the user request all information. It records the id, the user request id, the retry times, the data center id where the user request is received, the receiving time and the number of the instances.
      Parameters:
      requests - the user requests.

    • recordInstanceGroupFinishInfo

      void recordInstanceGroupFinishInfo(InstanceGroup instanceGroup)
      Record the instance group submit information. It records the finish time.
      Parameters:
      instanceGroup - the instance group.

    • recordInstanceGroupAllInfo

      void recordInstanceGroupAllInfo(InstanceGroup instanceGroup)
      Record the instance group all information. It records the instance group id, the id of the user request where the instance group belongs, the retry times, the data center id where the instance group is received, the receiving time, the finish time and the number of the instances.
      Parameters:
      instanceGroup - the instance group.

    • recordInstanceGroupGraphAllocateInfo

      void recordInstanceGroupGraphAllocateInfo(int srcDcId, int srcInstanceGroupId, int dstDcId, int dstInstanceGroupId, double bw, double startTime)
      It records the instance group graph allocate information. It records the source data center id, the source instance group id, the destination data center id, the destination instance group id, the bandwidth and the start time.
      Parameters:
      srcDcId - the source data center id.
      srcInstanceGroupId - the source instance group id.
      dstDcId - the destination data center id.
      dstInstanceGroupId - the destination instance group id.
      bw - the bandwidth.
      startTime - the start time.

    • recordInstanceGroupsGraph

      void recordInstanceGroupsGraph(List<InstanceGroup> instanceGroups)
      Record the instance group graph release information. It records the source data center id, the source instance group id, the destination data center id, the destination instance group id, the bandwidth and the start time.
      Parameters:
      instanceGroups - the instance groups.

    • recordInstanceGroupGraphReleaseInfo

      void recordInstanceGroupGraphReleaseInfo(int srcInstanceGroupId, int dstInstanceGroupId, double finishTime)
      Record the instance group graph release information. It records the finish time.
      Parameters:
      srcInstanceGroupId - the source instance group id.
      dstInstanceGroupId - the destination instance group id.
      finishTime - the finish time.

    • recordInstancesCreateInfo

      void recordInstancesCreateInfo(Map<Integer,List<Instance>> instances)
      Record the instances create information. It records the instance id, the id of the instance group where the instance belongs, the id of the user request where the instance belongs, the cpu, the ram, the storage, the bandwidth, the lifecycle, the retry times, the data center id where the instance is created, the host id where the instance is created and the start time.
      Parameters:
      instances - the instances.

    • recordInstancesCreateInfo

      void recordInstancesCreateInfo(List<InstanceGroup> instanceGroups)
      Record the instances finish information. It records the instance id, the id of the instance group where the instance belongs, the id of the user request where the instance belongs, the cpu, the ram, the storage, the bandwidth, the lifecycle, the retry times, the data center id where the instance is created, the host id where the instance is created and the start time.
      Parameters:
      instanceGroups - the instance groups.

    • recordInstancesFinishInfo

      void recordInstancesFinishInfo(List<Instance> instances)
      Record the instances finish information. It records the finish time.
      Parameters:
      instances - the instances.

    • recordInstancesAllInfo

      void recordInstancesAllInfo(List<Instance> instances)
      Record the instances all information. It records the instance id, the id of the instance group where the instance belongs, the id of the user request where the instance belongs, the cpu, the ram, the storage, the bandwidth, the lifecycle, the retry times, the data center id where the instance is created, the host id where the instance is created, the start time and the finish time.
      Parameters:
      instances - the instances.

    • recordConflict

      void recordConflict(double time, int sum)
      Record the conflict information.
      Parameters:
      time - the time.
      sum - the sum of the conflicts.

    • close

      void close()
      Close the SQLite database.
